Publish.LongDescription:
# Private alpha for Platter.
## Disclaimer: This is an experimental, potentially unstable release. Expect issues and bugs, not everything may work as it should. Always backup your saves. Use at your own risk.
## Please report any issues and share feedback on Discord. Include the following logs:
- `%localappdata%low\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\logs\Platter.log` - `%localappdata%low\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\logs\Player.log`
Publish.ChangeLog: - **New: Parcels will now show missing road connection before placing them.** - **Fixed: parcels causing building parts and trees to disappear** The internal placeholder system has been fixed and improved. - **Fixed: Brush tool for trees / assets can delete parcels.** Placeholder system now correctly prevents this. - Added automatic migration system. Your save's parcel's will automatically be changed to their correct non-placeholder variant. This may not fix hidden props - you will need to force an update to the area by plopping something new, wiggling things with move it, or similar methods. - **Fixed: Several issues with the pre-zone dropdown** - Fixed: Dropdown not responsive with large tool panel. - Fixed: Missing blur. - Fixed: Sidebar also scrolls instead of overflowing the panel. - Fixed: Packs are not longer duplicated. - **Fixed: Mouse Wheel shortcuts accidentally cause keybind conflicts. ** - Improvement: Changed language for overlay toggle for better clarity. - Improvement: Top left platter menu will accommodate longer sentences, such as in German. - Improvement: First image on tutorial is no longer squished. - Internal: Added ability for parcel to detect left, right, and backside connections, in preparation for future improvements.
